title: Smurfing sucks....
body: These days from lvl 1 to 15 its like there r no more noobs. like 60% of each team is made up of smurfs. sooo annoying!!! what wins games is how high in the elo your team mates are. God, i just wanna suck in peace, calm down smurf.

replies.body: haha if its 2 hard just stop playing or go fight the neutrals join a differnt lane u can make dieing fun try new stuff i no it sucks but maybe try assking for help more and suur ethese people are good but u will be one day so just fuck around for now dont take it 2 srsly

You realize that riot dealt with smurfs a long time ago right?  

After like 10 games, assuming you stomp all of the new players, the system will start putting you with other people who are stomping their games.  Hence you get around 60% of the people in your games as smurfs and the other 40% is there to keep que times down.  

My smurf is like level 12 and I'm regularly facing level 20-25s because I've pretty much won almost all of my games up until this point.  Now its just like playing on my normal account but I don't have proper runes or masteries (my god do I take that extra 15 ad and 26 ap for granted, you do so much less damage early game) and my champion pool consists of ziggs and jhin.  

Then again that doesn't bother me because im just leveling it up to 30 for ranked not for stomping level 10s.

Edit: Didn't realize you were the 40% of new players not the 60% of smurfs.  Welp sry bout that then,  its kind of a lottery of which 4 newbies get to join the smurfs.  Keep playing, riot recently made it a lot faster to climb and get proper gear so you can focus on getting better.  good luck
